name: grid-pattern
description: A background grid pattern made with SVGs, fully customizable using Tailwind CSS.

props.name: width
props.description: Width of each grid cell in pixels

props.name: height
props.description: Height of each grid cell in pixels

props.name: squares
props.description: Array of [x, y] coordinates for highlighted (filled) squares

props.name: strokeDasharray
props.description: SVG stroke dash array for the grid lines

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS classes for the SVG container
